name: tortoise treat
description:
I'm small and slow, but I love strawberries! Please feed me!

Play as a tortoise and eat as many strawberries* as you can before time runs out!

*note: some species of tortoises are unable to eat fruit. this one is special and he is hungry.

A small atmospheric game made in Unity! I worked on a prototype for this game during My First Game Jam: Summer Edition, which you can find [HERE]. This is my first game made in Unity and it was a lot of fun to make; I hope you enjoy it!

Made in Unity, 3D assets made in Maya, Textures and icons made in Photoshop and Zbrush.

Credits!

  • Birthday Cake Font by Michale Shillingburg
  • Bensound : "Sunny" - BGM
  • Freesound.org
